analysis.Summary: Vue component for the landing page's "Join Us" section. It displays a dynamic user count, a localized description, a call-to-action button linking to the sign-in page, and a floating avatars animation.
analysis.Purpose: To encourage visitors to join the service by showing a continually increasing user count and engaging floating images, serving as a visual and interactive section on the landing page.

Components.name: SectionJoinUs
Components.responsibility: Renders the user count, localized text, sign-in button, and includes the floating images animation.

Components.name: FloatingImages
Components.responsibility: Handles rendering and animating a set of images (avatars) floating within a container according to provided configuration.

Components.name: router-link
Components.responsibility: Vue Router component used for navigation to the "Sign In" route.

Functions.name: increaseUserCount
Functions.purpose: Starts a timer that increments the displayed user count by 1â€“2 every 1.33 seconds to simulate a growing user base.

analysis.Usage: Imported into a parent landing page component or layout. Typically used as <SectionJoinUs :content="..." :options="..."/> within a page to render the join-us section.
Notes: Uses <script setup> syntax and Composition API.
Localization is provided via vue-i18n using messages from props.content.
The interval in increaseUserCount is never cleared, but the component life cycle ends when the page is left.
FloatingImages configuration is passed inline; can be overridden via props.options.images.
Styles are scoped to the .container-joinus and its child .content.
